actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title VII of the act of October 17, 1976 (90 Stat. 2450).

summary.text: Expedites the study to be conducted as to the feasibility and suitability of the Mount Mitchell National Park, North Carolina. Prohibits the Secretary of the Interior from commencing land acquisition for such park until he receives Congressional authorization.

titles.title: A bill to amend title VII of the act of October 17, 1976 (90 Stat. 2450).
